definition: capital of Wei 魏 during Warring states/CL:根[gen1]
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
see 大夫[dai4 fu5]
Liang Dynasty (502-557)/Later Liang Dynasty (907-923)/surname Liang
variant of 梁[liang2]
roof beam/beam (structure)/bridge
to play a leading role/to bear a heavy responsibility

sentences.chinese: 这几根大梁承受得住压力。

sentences.english: This hut was built over a shallow depression that was covered with a timber framework.
sentences.chinese: 该棚屋建于一处浅洼地上，上方是木质大梁。

sentences.english: The first painted segment of the arch is ready for the mounting.
sentences.chinese: 拱状大梁的第一部分已经进入安置准备。

sentences.english: They bolt to the wing spar in two places using a single AN3 bolt.
sentences.chinese: 机翼大梁上的两个位置的螺栓使用了单一AN3螺栓。

sentences.english: At last they got to the point of installing the roof beam .
sentences.chinese: 最后，工程进行到安装屋顶大梁这一紧要步骤了。

sentences.english: The bridge will be fixed on two arched girders.
sentences.chinese: 大桥将由两个拱状大梁组成。

sentences.english: The girder is square in cross-section.
sentences.chinese: 这个大梁的截面是方形的。

sentences.english: It deforms in the mysterious bird God bird and pulverizes the girder.
sentences.chinese: 它在神奇鸟上帝鸟扭屈并且磨成粉大梁。

sentences.english: The crane is connected with the main beam through its under-frame and the truck chassis.
sentences.chinese: 起重机通过其底架与汽车底盘与大梁连接。

sentences.english: Apparently the back-bone chassis is expensive to manufacture to the required tolerances.
sentences.chinese: 显然，带大梁的车架的加工实在太昂贵了。
一般安装方式为大梁连接式。

sentences.english: The application of prestressed conversion beam on the steel reinforced concrete column has been studied.
sentences.chinese: 对劲性砼预应力转换大梁的应用进行了研究。

sentences.english: The Wuchang let flowers immediately notice Joe night rescue two double beam liyingwaihe.
sentences.chinese: 那五常让马上花通知乔大梁晚上里应外合营救二双。

sentences.english: Connecting the crossbeam to the apex of a triangular truss.
sentences.chinese: 连接大梁和三角孔桁梁顶点的支柱。

sentences.english: The girder was clinched into the wall.
I feel terribly for him but goalkeepers always need broad shoulders.
sentences.chinese: 我为他感到可惜，但是门将总是要挑起大梁的。

definition: heavy responsibility
Wei State (407-225 BC), one of the Seven Hero States of the Warring States 戰國七雄|战国七雄/Wei State or Cao Wei 曹魏 (220-265), the most powerful of the Three Kingdoms
heavy burden/difficult task/great responsibility

Yan, a vassal state of Zhou in modern Hebei and Liaoning/north Hebei/the four Yan kingdoms of the Sixteen Kingdoms, namely: Former Yan 前燕 (337-370), Later Yan 後燕|后燕 (384-409), Southern Yan 南燕 (398-410), Northern Yan 北燕 (409-436)
to play a leading role/to bear a heavy responsibility
to take upon oneself/to assume
to guard
to defend one's country
state of Wei (c. 1040-209 BC), vassal of Zhou
banner
to serve the king diligently/to save the country in times of danger/to send troops to rescue the king
pillar/backbone
(idiom) to take on a leadership role at a time of crisis
Zhao, one of the seven states during the Warring States Period of Chinese history (475-220 BC)
to go into battle/to campaign (military)
the state of Qin, one of the seven states of the Warring States Period (475-220 BC)
(of troops stationed in a strategic area) to defend/(fig.) to stand guard/to protect
